verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w woods|strong="H3293"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* among \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forests|strong="H6086"\w*?

\w Shall|strong="H3627"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w pin|strong="H3489"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w thereon|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w fuel|strong="H0402"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof \w is|strong="H2009"\w* reduced \w to|strong="H5414"\w* ashes: shall \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* useful \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*?

\w Even|strong="H0637"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w whole|strong="H8549"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* fit \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*: \w how|strong="H0637"\w* \w much|strong="H0637"\w* \w less|strong="H0637"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w forests|strong="H6086"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* consumed, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, \w because|strong="H3282"\w* \w they|strong="H3282"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w been|strong="H4603"\w* transgressors, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.
